alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 02 at 4:43AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A FLOOD WATCH REAMINS IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY... WHAT...Flash flooding is possible across the territory. WHERE...all islands of American Samoa WHEN...Through Monday IMPACTS...Numerous to widespread showers may be heavy at times. Additionally, higher gusts during heavy showers, and landslides/mudslides is possible. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The South Pacific Convergence Zone (SPCZ) edges closer to the territory and will produce numerous to widespread showers with embedded thunderstorms. Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa Ofisa o le Tau Pago Pago AS 442 Vaveao Aso Sa Ianuari 2 2022 ...O LOO FA`AAUAU LE NOFO VA`AVA`AIA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA SE`IA OO I LE ASO GAFUA MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega e mafua mai i Fetaula`iga o Savili i le Pasefika i Saute. NOFOAGA...mo Amerika Samoa atoa. TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Gafua AAFIAGA...E tetele timuga, mamafa i taimi mo le po nanei. Ma, o savili e agi fa`ata`uta`u i taimi e mamafa ai timuga, fa`apea sologa. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O Fetaula`iga o Savili i le Pasefika i Saute o le a se`e lata mai i le atunu`u ma o le a fa`atupula`ia ai le tetele o timuga ma faititili e ono pa pa ai. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le nofo vaavaaia mo tafega ma lologa, o le ono faatupula`ia lea o le tetele o timuga, tafega ma lologa, fa`apea sologa mai i mauga po o eleelee, ona o uiga louloua o le tau. E tatau ona tapena ma faalogologo i le leitio mo tala o le tau, ae maise pe a iai se faailo mo se lapataiga mo tafega ma lologa.
info.instruction: A flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
